thread.title: Basketball player sues Ohio college over suspension
thread.title_full: Basketball player sues Ohio college over suspension

title: Basketball player sues Ohio college over suspension
text: > Top News Basketball player sues Ohio college over suspension FILE - This Thursday, March 19, 2015, file photo shows Dayton's Dyshawn Pierre catching a pass during practice for an NCAA college basketball tournament second-round game in Columbus, Ohio. Pierre has sued the Ohio school in federal court over his suspension after a sexual assault accusation. Pierreâ€™s lawsuit asks a U.S. district court judge to order his reinstatement, and also seeks unspecified damages. (AP Photo/Tony Dejak, File)
